title: Integrate static photo/audio/video assets in public root (filename-only)

requirements.summary: Place the 4 uploaded images in the static public root and map them to photo1.jpg–photo4.jpg (filename-only) for Slide 2.
acceptanceCriteria: The deployed app serves the four uploaded images at /photo1.jpg, /photo2.jpg, /photo3.jpg, /photo4.jpg (public root).
Slide 2 displays the four photos (not placeholders) and tapping each still opens its corresponding popup message.
No code references are changed to include folders/paths for these photos; they remain filename-only (e.g., "photo1.jpg").

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded image Snapchat-1050840213.jpg to the app static public root under the exact required filename photo1.jpg (no subfolders).
Add the uploaded image Snapchat-611037636.jpg to the app static public root under the exact required filename photo2.jpg (no subfolders).
Add the uploaded image IMG_20260205_190742.jpg to the app static public root under the exact required filename photo3.jpg (no subfolders).

requirements.summary: Ensure a happy birthday song is available at the static public root as birthday.mp3 so the existing background-music flow works.
acceptanceCriteria: After the user dismisses the start overlay and the 5-second countdown completes, the app successfully plays birthday.mp3 (looping, volume ~0.6).
If birthday.mp3 is missing, the app does not crash; it logs a warning at most and continues functioning.

file_operations.description: Add the provided audio file "Happy Birthday to You - piano instrumental with lyrics.mp3" to the static public root under the exact required filename birthday.mp3 (no subfolders).

requirements.summary: Include video1.mp4 and video2.mp4 in the static public root (filename-only) and ensure missing videos remain non-fatal with warnings only.
acceptanceCriteria: When valid MP4 files are present at /video1.mp4 and /video2.mp4, Slide 3 plays video1.mp4 and Slide 4 plays video2.mp4 via the existing heartbeat play button interaction.
If one or both videos are missing, the app remains usable, does not crash, and logs a warning at most.
No code references are changed to include folders/paths for these videos; they remain filename-only (e.g., "video1.mp4").

file_operations.description: Add an MP4 file to the static public root under the exact required filename video1.mp4 (no subfolders). If using the provided asset Snapchat-1254858543.mp4, copy it here as video1.mp4.

Add an MP4 file to the static public root under the exact required filename video2.mp4 (no subfolders). If the user has not provided a second video yet, leave this file absent in the repo and rely on the app's graceful behavior as documented in ASSET_SETUP.md.

Adjust the play-button interaction to remain graceful when video1.mp4 is missing/unplayable: only set isPlaying=true and call onVideoStart() after the play() promise resolves; keep current warning-only behavior on failure (no crash) and keep src as filename-only "video1.mp4".

Adjust the play-button interaction to remain graceful when video2.mp4 is missing/unplayable: only set isPlaying=true and call onVideoStart() after the play() promise resolves; keep current warning-only behavior on failure (no crash) and keep src as filename-only "video2.mp4".

requirements.summary: Update ASSET_SETUP.md to document the uploaded-filename to required-filename mapping and reiterate required public-root assets.
acceptanceCriteria: ASSET_SETUP.md includes a clear mapping list from Snapchat-1050840213.jpg, Snapchat-611037636.jpg, IMG_20260205_190742.jpg, IMG_20260206_020104.jpg to photo1.jpg–photo4.jpg.
ASSET_SETUP.md continues to state that all assets must be in the public root with exact filenames and no subfolders.
